items.name: Skin of the Lords
explicitMods: You can only Socket Corrupted Gems in this item
flavourText: The Lords are chosen so carefully.
Only they may grace His flesh.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 25% less Projectile Damage
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Projectile Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates.
explicitMods:
Projectiles continuously lose Damage, up to 50% less Damage by the time they dissipate
Projectiles have 25% chance to Freeze, which is lost over the first quarter of their flight
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
explicitMods: Second form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Second form has +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Second form has 300% more Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Supported Cold Skill Gems
Supported Skills deal 8% increased Cold Damage
Supported Skills have 188 to 282 added Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 69 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3142 total Damage from Hits

items.name: Heartbound Loop
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
420 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

enchantMods: Armageddon Brand has 12% increased Activation Frequency
implicitMods: Adds 10 to 21 Cold Damage to Spells

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon Skeleton Warrior minions at the targeted location. They use a melee attack and die after a duration. If made aggressive, Skeleton Warriors will also dash towards nearby enemies.
explicitMods: Minions can't be Damaged for 2.3 seconds after being Summoned

socketedItems.secDescrText: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains on to other nearby enemies. Each time the main beam chains it will also chain to a second enemy, but that secondary arc cannot chain further.
explicitMods: 15% more Damage for each remaining Chain
